original_text: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
korean_text: 안개를 땅 끝에서 일으키시며 비를 위하여 번개를 만드시며 바람을 그 곳간에서 내시는도다

sentences.original_text: He causeth the vapours to ascend from ends of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 땅 끝에서 수증기를 오르게 하시니

sentences.original_text: he maketh lightnings for the rain
he bringeth wind out of his treasuries
